cta.p: Stop treating meetings as 'write-only' memory. Turn them into your competitive advantage.

items.desc: The AI automatically separates 'Chatter' from 'Decisions'. It formats the protocol so you can scan a 60-minute meeting in 30 seconds.
items.title: 1. Structural Analysis

items.desc: Using our Strategy feature, the AI acts as a consultant. It finds the 'Top Issue', offers 'Counter-arguments' you might have missed, and proposes 'Lateral Thinking' solutions.
items.title: 2. Strategic Analysis (The 'Brain')

items.desc: By identifying owners and deadlines automatically, the AI turns talk into a project management feed. It answers 'Who needs to do what?' without you asking.
items.title: 3. Contextual Analysis

hero.tagline: The era of the 'scribe' is over. Minutes.AI acts as your automated business analyst, turning hours of conversation into structured data, risk assessments, and strategic next steps.

intro.p1: Many teams suffer from 'Data Debt'. They record every meeting, but nobody has time to review them. A raw transcript is just a wall of text—it's data, but it's not *information*.
intro.p2: True 'Protocol Analysis' means understanding the context. Minutes.AI doesn't just listen; it thinks. It structures your chaos into clear Decisions, Concerns, and Action Items.

seo.description: Stop just transcribing. Start analyzing. Learn how Minutes.AI transforms raw meeting audio into structured data, strategic insights, and decision-ready reports.
seo.keywords: AI analysis, meeting intelligence, protocol analysis, business insights, Minutes.AI strategy

ld.description: A guide to using AI not just for recording, but for analyzing meeting dynamics, extracting core issues, and generating strategic counter-measures.
ld.headline: AI Protocol Analysis: Beyond Simple Transcription

seo.ogDescription: Searching for 'AI protocol analysis'? See how Minutes.AI uses ChatGPT-5 & Gemini 2.5 Pro to extract trends, decisions, and counter-arguments from your meetings.
seo.ogTitle: From Scribe to Analyst: The Power of AI Meeting Analysis
seo.title: AI Protocol Analysis: Turning Meeting Audio into Business Intelligence (2025)

strategy.boost: **Boost Analysis:** Identifies what is working well and suggests how to scale it.
strategy.counter: **Counter Analysis:** Plays 'Devil's Advocate' to help you spot risks before they happen.
strategy.p1: For deeper insights, our Strategy function applies advanced models (like Gemini 2.5 Pro) to your protocol.

visual.p: This is not a mock-up. This is how Minutes.AI renders a chaotic marketing meeting into a structured, analyzed protocol.

sample.coreMessage: Shift 30% of the TV budget to Influencer Marketing; focus on 'User Trust' campaign.

concerns: Need a strict vetting process for influencers to avoid scandals.
discussion: TV ads ROI has dropped by 12% YoY.
Elena raised concerns about brand safety with influencers.

actionItems: James — Draft new guidelines for unscripted reviews by Friday.
keyMessages: Users are tired of hype. They want raw, unedited reviews.
